hs_programs.name: Early Childhood
ircs: Child Development Associate (CDA) Credential – National credential

requires portfolio, exam, and professional observation. NAEYC Professional Standards / Competencies – ethical guidelines, professionalism, developmental practices. Head Start Early Learning Outcomes Framework (ELOF) – developmental benchmarks for social, emotional, cognitive, language, and physical domains. Common Core State Standards (CCSS) – early literacy and numeracy readiness. State-specific Early Learning Standards – aligns programs with Maryland and regional requirements.

CSM – Early Childhood Education Certificate / LDR; child development, classroom management, CDA prep.

hs_programs.name: Teacher Academy
ircs: INTASC Standards – learner development, instructional practice, assessment, learning environment, professional responsibility. Maryland Essential Dimensions of Teaching (EdoTs) – evaluation framework for teacher effectiveness. ParaPro Certification – competency in reading, math, classroom support. Praxis Core Academic Skills – reading, writing, math readiness for teacher prep. Advance CTE Education Career Cluster Framework – instructional design, educational technology, diverse learners. ISTE Standards for Educators – technology integration, digital citizenship. AAQEP & CAEP Standards – educator program quality, clinical practice, program impact.

universities.name: UMGC
universities.program: B.S. in Emergency Management; leadership in disaster response, hazard mitigation, and public safety systems. Towson University – B.S. in Emergency Services / Public Safety; advanced emergency response, ICS leadership, and homeland security integration.

community_colleges.name: PGCC
community_colleges.program: Fire & Rescue Certificate; state-aligned firefighting principles, emergency response, and EMS integration. Howard CC – Firefighter Certificate; practical firefighting skills, emergency response, hazardous materials handling.

universities.name: UMGC
universities.program: B.S. in Emergency Management / Fire Services track; leadership, hazard mitigation, EMS, and public safety systems integration. Towson University – B.S. in Fire & Emergency Services; advanced firefighting, leadership, and integrated emergency management.
